1.0.name: wordpress/ccs-navigation
1.0.description: CCS-NAVIGATION is a dynamic navigation widget that is placed in the sidebar of your theme. This widget builds a navigation structure for the current page (links to sub-pages) and each of the ancestor level pages. The easiet way to explain this is to simply try it out or check out the products section of our website to see it in action: http://www.creativecloudsolutions.com/products/
